themeNote: Available themes: ghost, neon, blue, red, yellowred, yellow, hacker

autorestart.note: the system is automatically restarts in 3 hours

autoDeleteCache.note: auto delete caches in 1 hour, kindly set the status to true, if you dont want to delete caches, set the status to false.
